org.mindroid.impl.sensor

Class EV3SensorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Listener
      • org.mindroid.impl.sensor.EV3SensorManager

  • public class EV3SensorManager
extends com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Listener
    Manages the SensorEndpoints. Has a connection to the Brick.
